pr_automation_id.description: The id of the pr automation to call.  Use this to actually provision some infrastructure.

context.description: A json encoded string valued map for the given call, this should fill out the entries in the configuration field of the pr automation with decent initial configurations a user can modify, with keys being the name of each field and values being the expected value.

branch.description: The branch to create the PR on.  If not provided, the user will specify a branch name.
